transportAdvice: Honolulu has a public bus network that covers most tourist areas including Waikiki, downtown, and major attractions, making it a viable option for budget-conscious travelers. Taxis and ride-hail vehicles are widely available, and Waikiki itself is very walkable, though a rental car is useful for exploring the wider island of Oahu.

weather.description: Mild and pleasant with occasional showers, making it one of the cooler and wetter months but still very comfortable for beach visits.
Similar to January with warm days and occasional rain, still a popular time to visit with comfortable temperatures.
Transitioning toward drier conditions with warm temperatures and a mix of sun and passing showers.
Rain becomes less frequent and temperatures warm slightly, offering excellent beach and outdoor conditions.
Warm and mostly sunny with low rainfall, marking the beginning of the dry season and ideal travel conditions.
Warm and dry with long sunny days, one of the best months for beach activities and water sports.
Peak summer heat with abundant sunshine and calm ocean conditions, though crowds and prices are at their highest.
Hot and humid with very little rain, excellent for swimming and snorkeling but expect busy beaches.
Still warm and mostly dry, with slightly fewer crowds than July and August while retaining great beach weather.
Temperatures begin to ease slightly and rainfall increases as the wet season approaches, but conditions remain pleasant.
Noticeably wetter with more frequent showers, though warm temperatures and fewer tourists make it a good value period.
Mild and occasionally rainy with a festive holiday atmosphere, still warm enough for beach activities between showers.
